title: Interactive Games
description: Frontend project featuring flex card animations and three interactive games: Hangman, Bubble Game, and Stone Paper Scissors.

title: Wordle Clone
description: Created a responsive Wordle clone with two additional features, leveraging modern JavaScript ES6+ for efficient and maintainable code.

title: Fyle Project
description: Dynamic navigation menu project using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap. Integrated Swiper.js for carousel functionality.
